mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pass, member_name, member_post, member_address1, member_address2, member_phone, member_email, member_date) values (#{member_id}, #{member_pass}, #{member_name}, #{member_post}, #{member_address1}, #{member_address2}, #{member_phone}, #{member_email}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id=#{member_id}
select * from member m join facility f on m.member_id = f.member_id where m.member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into basket(member_id, book_number, basket_number) values (#{member_id}, #{book_number}, #{basket_number})
mapper.select: select * from member m left join basket b on m.member_id = b.member_id left join book bk on b.book_number = bk.book_number left join bbook bb on bk.book_number = bb.book_number left join rbook rb on bb.book_number = rb.book_number where m.member_id=#{member_id} and b.basket_number is not null order by b.basket_number desc
select ifnull(max(rbook_num),0) from rbook where book_number=#{book_number}
mapper.insert: insert into rbook(book_number, member_id, rbook_num, rbook_date, rbook_check) values (#{book_number}, #{member_id}, #{rbook_num}+1, now(), '1') (#{book_number}, #{member_id}, #{rbook_num}+1, now(), '0') (#{book_number}, #{member_id}, #{rbook_num}+1, now(), '1')
mapper.update: update rbook set rbook_check='0' where rbook_num=3
mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) from rbook where book_number=#{book_number} and member_id=#{member_id}
select* from bbook b left join book bk on b.book_number = bk.book_number where member_id=#{member_id} order by bbook_bdate desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize};
